title: 7/13/17 - Glenn's message to the media
description:
Glenn's message to the media and why they're going after President Trump so much ...Terri Schiavo's brother Bobby Schindler from LifeAndHope.com discusses the latest on the Charlie Gard story and the courtroom tragedy that continues to play out in Britain ...Scientists have successfully teleported from Earth to Space?

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
